name: Parasite (itch) (SimonAshcroftGD)
description:
Parasite is a game I created for the 185th weeklygamejam. The game is about infecting the world before a vaccine is completed.

I created this game in around 5 days as I was late to starting the GameJam. All the programming and assets were created by myself using Autodesk Maya and UnrealEngine4.
